meanings.sent1: The baby's skin felt the talciest after the bath.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were the talciest after playing in the sandbox.
meanings.sent3: The clown's face was the talciest after accidentally spilling talcum powder.
meanings.sent4: The snowy mountain peak looked talciest under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The softest blanket in the store felt talciest against my skin.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the powders, the talciest one was chosen for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The talciest mineral found in the mine was used for research purposes.
meanings.sent3: The talciest rock in the collection was mistaken for marble by the geologist.
meanings.sent4: The talciest cloud in the sky resembled a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent5: The talciest chalk available made writing on the blackboard effortless.
